name: ACI Savlon Liquid Antiseptic
description:
Savlon Liquid Antiseptic is used in first-aid to clean wounds and prevent infection. It contains two medicines available called chlorhexidine and cetrimide which are both antiseptics that kill germs. Savlon can be used on minor cuts, abrasions, stings, and insect bites. It disinfects, prevents infection, and promotes the natural healing process of the skin. It can also be used in bathing.

name: Dettol Antiseptic Disinfectant Liquid
description:

Dettol Liquid needs to be used diluted and is used for First Aid, Medical & Personal Hygiene.  Usage Direction: Read the back label before use Safety Direction: For external use only and is not edible. name: ACI Savlon Antiseptic Cream
description:
Savlon Antiseptic Cream provides a 2 step solution for germ protection. It treats any wound in the skin and helps to heal the wound quicker by speeding up the 3 phases of wound closing- Inflammation, Tissue Formation, and Tissue Remodeling.  It serves the dual purpose of soothing the skin and providing protection against germs as well.

name: Hexisol Hand Rub
description:
Hexisol Hand Rub 50 ml Details:Hexisol Hand Rub is a highly effective hand sanitizer that helps kill germs and bacteria. It is a clear, alcohol-based solution designed to provide quick and convenient hand hygiene without the need for water. Hexisol Hand Rub comes in a small 50 ml bottle, making it portable and ideal for carrying in bags, purses, or pockets for on-the-go use. Its non-sticky formula dries quickly, leaving your hands feeling clean and refreshed. WeightThe weight of the product is 50 milliliters, which is a convenient size for personal use and travel. IngredientsThe main ingredients typically include:  -Isopropyl Alcohol or Ethyl Alcohol (usually around 60-70%)  - Water- Glycerin (to moisturize and prevent skin dryness)  - Hydrogen Peroxide (to help disinfect)  - Fragrance (optional)  - Carbomer (a gelling agent)  - Triethanolamine (to adjust pH)   Uses:- Hand Sanitization: Apply a small amount (about 3-5 ml) to your palm and rub your hands together until dry. It helps eliminate germs and bacteria when soap and water are unavailable.  - On-the-Go Hygiene: Perfect for use when traveling, in public places, or after touching surfaces like door handles, ATM machines, or shopping carts.  - Post-Cough or Sneeze: Use after coughing or sneezing to maintain hygiene.  - Before Eating: Great for sanitizing hands before meals when soap and water are not readily accessible.  - In Healthcare Settings: Used in clinics, hospitals, and by healthcare workers to maintain hand hygiene.
Hexisol Hand Rub 50 ml
 
Details:
Hexisol Hand Rub is a highly effective hand sanitizer that helps kill germs and bacteria. It is a clear, alcohol-based solution designed to provide quick and convenient hand hygiene without the need for water. Hexisol Hand Rub comes in a small 50 ml bottle, making it portable and ideal for carrying in bags, purses, or pockets for on-the-go use. Its non-sticky formula dries quickly, leaving your hands feeling clean and refreshed.
 
Weight
The weight of the product is 50 milliliters, which is a convenient size for personal use and travel.
 
Ingredients
The main ingredients typically include:  
-Isopropyl Alcohol or Ethyl Alcohol (usually around 60-70%)  
- Water
- Glycerin (to moisturize and prevent skin dryness)  
- Hydrogen Peroxide (to help disinfect)  
- Fragrance (optional)  
- Carbomer (a gelling agent)  
- Triethanolamine (to adjust pH)  
 
Uses:
- Hand Sanitization: Apply a small amount (about 3-5 ml) to your palm and rub your hands together until dry. It helps eliminate germs and bacteria when soap and water are unavailable.  
- On-the-Go Hygiene: Perfect for use when traveling, in public places, or after touching surfaces like door handles, ATM machines, or shopping carts.  
- Post-Cough or Sneeze: Use after coughing or sneezing to maintain hygiene.  
- Before Eating: Great for sanitizing hands before meals when soap and water are not readily accessible.  
- In Healthcare Settings: Used in clinics, hospitals, and by healthcare workers to maintain hand hygiene.

name: ACI Savlon Antiseptic
description:
ACI Savlon Antiseptic is a trusted and widely used antiseptic solution designed to provide effective protection against germs and infections. It is perfect for cleaning wounds, as well as for general disinfecting and sanitizing needs in homes and healthcare settings. BenefitsAntiseptic Protection: Effectively kills a wide range of bacteria, viruses, and fungi, helping to prevent infections and promote faster healing.Multi-Purpose Use: Ideal for cleaning cuts, wounds, and abrasions. Can also be used for sanitizing surfaces, hands, and personal items.Gentle on Skin: While it provides strong protection, it is also gentle on the skin and can be safely used for personal hygiene and first-aid purposes. Trusted Brand: Savlon is a recognized and trusted name in personal hygiene and antiseptic products. Large Size: The 5-litre bottle offers great value and is ideal for regular use in homes, hospitals, clinics, and businesses. IngredientsChlorhexidine Gluconate: The active ingredient that provides the antiseptic properties.Alcohol: Works with Chlorhexidine to enhance the solution's germ-killing power.Water and Other Inactive Ingredients: For dilution and formulation balance. Use :For Wound Care: Dilute the antiseptic with water as per instructions to clean minor cuts, scratches, and wounds.For Surface Disinfection: Use diluted Savlon solution to clean surfaces and prevent contamination.For Personal Hygiene: Add a few drops to a bucket of water for cleaning the body or sanitizing the hands and feet. Safe SuggestionsAvoid Direct Contact with Eyes: If Savlon comes in contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water.Use with Care for Sensitive Skin: In case of sensitive skin, dilute the solution as recommended or perform a patch test before widespread use.Keep Away from Children: Store the product in a safe place, away from children, to prevent accidental ingestion. Net Weight : 5 Litre
ACI Savlon Antiseptic is a trusted and widely used antiseptic solution designed to provide effective protection against germs and infections. It is perfect for cleaning wounds, as well as for general disinfecting and sanitizing needs in homes and healthcare settings.
 
Benefits
Antiseptic Protection: Effectively kills a wide range of bacteria, viruses, and fungi, helping to prevent infections and promote faster healing.
Multi-Purpose Use: Ideal for cleaning cuts, wounds, and abrasions. Can also be used for sanitizing surfaces, hands, and personal items.
Gentle on Skin: While it provides strong protection, it is also gentle on the skin and can be safely used for personal hygiene and first-aid purposes.
 
Trusted Brand: 
Savlon is a recognized and trusted name in personal hygiene and antiseptic products.
 
Large Size: 
The 5-litre bottle offers great value and is ideal for regular use in homes, hospitals, clinics, and businesses.
 
Ingredients
Chlorhexidine Gluconate: The active ingredient that provides the antiseptic properties.
Alcohol: Works with Chlorhexidine to enhance the solution's germ-killing power.
Water and Other Inactive Ingredients: For dilution and formulation balance.
 
Use :
For Wound Care: Dilute the antiseptic with water as per instructions to clean minor cuts, scratches, and wounds.
For Surface Disinfection: Use diluted Savlon solution to clean surfaces and prevent contamination.
For Personal Hygiene: Add a few drops to a bucket of water for cleaning the body or sanitizing the hands and feet.
 
Safe Suggestions
Avoid Direct Contact with Eyes: If Savlon comes in contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water.
Use with Care for Sensitive Skin: In case of sensitive skin, dilute the solution as recommended or perform a patch test before widespread use.
Keep Away from Children: Store the product in a safe place, away from children, to prevent accidental ingestion.
 
Net Weight : 5 Litre

name: SMC Orsaline-N
description:
Manufacturer: Social Marketing Company Ltd. ORSaline-N the flagship brand from SMC is one of the most trusted brands in Bangladesh. It saves millions of lives every year. SMC pioneered and launched ORSaline in the year 1985 when the death toll from diarrhea was rapidly growing among children. It was re-introduced with the brand name ORSaline-N with the new formula recommended by WHO and UNICEF in 2004.SMC’s ORSaline-N is the number one choice in diarrhea and dehydration management and is the trusted brand available in every corner of Bangladesh. The market for ORS is being driven by growth in two areas: treatment of dehydration caused by diarrhea and dehydration caused by excessive sweating. Composition: Sodium chloride, Potassium Chloride, Trisodium citrate dihydrate, Glucose Anhydrous
Manufacturer: Social Marketing Company Ltd.
 
ORSaline-N the flagship brand from SMC is one of the most trusted brands in Bangladesh. It saves millions of lives every year. SMC pioneered and launched ORSaline in the year 1985 when the death toll from diarrhea was rapidly growing among children. It was re-introduced with the brand name ORSaline-N with the new formula recommended by WHO and UNICEF in 2004.
SMC’s ORSaline-N is the number one choice in diarrhea and dehydration management and is the trusted brand available in every corner of Bangladesh. The market for ORS is being driven by growth in two areas: treatment of dehydration caused by diarrhea and dehydration caused by excessive sweating.
 
Composition: Sodium chloride, Potassium Chloride, Trisodium citrate dihydrate, Glucose Anhydrous

name: Saba Vegetable Washing And Fruits Liquid
description:
Saba Vegetable Washing Liquid is made from pine tree oil.  This liquid destroys all types of Formalin, Insecticides, Pesticides, Carbide, and Chemicals from Vegetables, Fruits, Fishes, etc. One bottle can be used for six months to 1 year. Because 3/4 drops are enough to clean enough fruit and vegetables.

It is a versatile and multipurpose cream that provides relief and care for various skin concerns. With its healing and protective properties, Boroline is a household name in India, trusted by generations for its effectiveness in addressing a variety of skin issues.

name: Sirona Herbal Headache Relief Patch
description:
Instant Relief from Headaches and Migraine. Clean and dry the affected area before application. Peel off a patch from the sheet at a time. Apply one patch on each side of the forehead (temples). Note: Use a patch once in 12 hours or as directed by the physician.
